bufferView.description: The id (JSON property name) of the bufferView referenced by this attribute.

byteOffset.description: The offset relative to the bufferView in bytes.  Similar to vertexAttribPointer() pointer (ES) / offset (WebGL) parameter.

byteStride.description: The stride, in bytes, between attributes referenced by this accessor.  vertexAttribPointer() stride parameter.

count.description: The number of attributes referenced by this accessor, not to be confused with the number of bytes or number of components.

componentType.description: vertexAttribPointer() type parameter.  Corresponding typed arrays: Int8Array, Uint8Array, Int16Array, Uint16Array, and Float32Array.

max.description: Maximum value of each component in this attribute.

min.description: Minimum value of each component in this attribute.
